_sText:
Well... after V1 was a complete flop (much too large for GG, also I put it in the wrong section on FPSBanana and got it trashed.. OOPSIE DAISY), I created V2.

V1 had a large basement (hence the name, it amde it a bomb shelter) which juust provided too many camping spots for GG... so I deleted the basement and turned it into a "Rage Kage" (a large room used for knifing only.... no rules.. gangbanging allowed... yo ucan find one on BaggedArena, which is also made by me (:D ) as well as Cray_Shotty_Akcolt (made by Crayola)... they're good fun). The switch in the main room turns the lights off in the cabin...... but they can be turned back on... so no worries.

Anyway. I hope this one is more enjoyed that Version 1 was.

NOTE: The skybox texture is not made by me.. but infact its made by Hazel Whorley.
